content: Once this monk has been defeated, check the corner of this snowdrift for a green Wisp to absorb.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Once this monk has been defeated, check the corner of this snowdrift for a green Wisp to absorb.
